meanings.definition: A landing and takeoff area for helicopters.
meanings.sent1: The heliport was busy with helicopters coming and going.
meanings.sent2: The helicopter landed smoothly at the heliport.
meanings.sent3: Why did the helicopter bring a cake to the heliport?
meanings.sent4: The heliport was a bustling hive of activity.
meanings.sent5: The bright lights of the heliport guided the helicopters safely.

meanings.definition: To land or take off from a heliport.
meanings.sent1: The pilot will heliport the helicopter on the rooftop.
meanings.sent2: They heliported to the remote island for a rescue mission.
meanings.sent3: I heliport to work every day in my dream.
meanings.sent4: She heliports gracefully, like a bird in flight.
meanings.sent5: The hero heliported in to save the day just in time.
